item.title: Bitumen
item.description: Imported bitumen NZTA takes control New Zealand | Imports and Exports Marsden Point to halt bitumen production New Zealand prepares for shifts in bitumen supply

item.title: In The Press
item.description: Jun 2021 - Marsden Point closure could expose NZ to fuel security risks Aug 2021 - Marsden Point refinery closure threatens energy security, Maritime Union says Aug 2021 - Government defends import-only strategy The Ministry of Business, Innovation and Employment (MBIE) said that “would mark a significant change in New Zealand’s fuel supply chain”. But its advice was that the supply chain was secure because the country could get fuel from multiple locations overseas.

item.title: Timeline - Loss of Our Refinery
item.description: We detail some of the main events in the loss of our refinery, with the help of documents obtained by an OIA request. 2018-11-12 Domestic oil and gas exploration ban 2019-12-19 MBIE discussion paper - Accelerating renewable energy According to Megan Woods (ideological and unproven): The coming years will see a complete re-wiring of global energy systems in response to the threat of climate change, and the economic and environmental opportunities low emissions energy sources are creating
